name: SilkChart
headline: AI Sales Assistant to increase playbook adoption and win more deals
description: SilkChart analyzes sales calls and measures how well playbooks are executed. It proactively surfaces coaching opportunities to managers, and provides reps with actionable feedback to close more deals.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Andreea Francis, Founder
founders.description: Founder at SilkChart (S22). Formerly head of growth at Instacart, and product at X (Twitter).

# Go beyond call recording – actually increase playbook adoption
SilkChart analyzes sales calls and measures how well playbooks are executed. It proactively surfaces coaching opportunities to managers, and provides reps with actionable feedback to close more deals.
[Get Started Free](https://www.silkchart.com/<https:/app.silkchart.com/auth/register>)[Get a Demo](https://www.silkchart.com/<https:/calendly.com/silkchart/silkchart-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a14ff8b18c96a360cb7b7_green-checkmark.svg)
100% free plan with unlimited call recordings
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6737a27ecae08f12a732a346_App%20Screenshot%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a267e1671f7eaa84318ee_hero_video-overlay.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a26b74bfd9f15e3f619aa_Play%20Button.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6786ca620d1aeae91241bbc3_tab-video-text.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a1723ca462d4e8a36aef9_Hero%20Section%20-%20bg.svg)
Trusted by top sales teams
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b4c855d94f47b5fa1_Calendly-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b4d77f6f8b585fd42_Juicebox-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b56b954c7cf23d545_brex-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3bb38af210500e6714_Ramp-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b0f04e0e699117a88_revelo-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b885417cb82dea9ff_streak-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673b666022382b08486371d3_vellum-logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b0f04e0e699117a75_Rippling-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6745a5298e2729b70f690240_user-interviews-logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/673c3f3b24d09a6c49bd3f91_woven-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6745a52950f313e63632806d_Primary-Latchel-Black-1%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6745a529d243433300a282a7_recall-logo.svg)
Playbook
## Improve sales playbook adoption
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a3b06a79481f1c8b310c1_ClipboardListOutline-blue.svg)
Choose from proven playbooks (eg MEDDIC, Challenger Sales, SPIN, SPICED) or create your own
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a3b065b0875ddf9675ba6_ChartSquareBarOutline-blue.svg)
Track playbook adoption for each rep, and across calls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a3b0666e13a84d892c13b_CollectionOutline-blue.svg)
Use personalized scorecards - help each rep address their biggest opportunities to improve
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6737a12a9cbe27ef96935faa_Image2.png)
Insights
## Optimize meeting performance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a35d56c6837655d1b98cb_ChatAlt2Outline-red.svg)
Nail objection handling - Compare your reps' responses to preferred answers to drive improvements
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a35d5fc5ac554ef7f091e_thumbs-up-red.svg)
Specific, actionable feedback for each call, giving reps examples of how to rephrase to improve conversions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a35d567450476c0339374_CheckCircleOutline-red.svg)
Identify what the best reps are saying that others can replicate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a2b4cf7eb8d2c5627c18d_Image-feature-2.png)
Team Analytics
## Review morecalls in less time
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a3dfe6dac490b5fa3f702_UserGroupOutline-green.svg)
SilkChart automatically surfaces the calls and repsyou need to pay attention to
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a3dff193fb40a14cedc46_ExclamationOutline-green.svg)
Get instant alerts for churn risk, forecast risk, sentiment, and competitor mentions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a3dfe4c6782566c4c0165_TagOutline-green.svg)
Automatic keyword analysis, score cards, and customizable summaries for each call
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672cd686fdec0094819284d4_green-feature-image.png)
AI Coach
## AI to scale coaching across the team
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a426ff6462a1e63d7a0fb_SparklesOutline-violet.svg)
Let AI do the coaching – reps get clear, specific, and objective feedback for each call
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a426fd958f8555e8e37cf_QuestionMarkCircleOutline-violet.svg)
“What you could have said” shows reps exactly what they could’ve said to increase odds of conversion
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672a426f67d43e2b529ba60e_phone-off-violet.svg)
Stop waiting for 1:1s - reps get feedback immediately after each call
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672cd6f34d7bb1c14431e65d_ai-coach-image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b35f6a8055420706075ae_leading-indicators-icon.svg)
### Deal health based on Leading Indicators
SilkChart surfaces signals of deal health based on the analysis of each call, so that sales teams can identify deal risks early.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b35f6bce58c69fdf73dde_teams-icons.svg)
### Built specifically forB2B SaaS sales teams
The first sales call analysis tool to measure performance and provide benchmarks specific to SaaS team needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b35f6214ef54b441b3c21_sale-process-icon.svg)
### The samesales process
We automatically process calls, without any input or extra work. Set it up in 5 mins and get back to talking to users.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b36c08a5c3c9d66cc07e8_middle-background-with-circle.svg)
Get insights where you need them, without the hassle
### Seamless integrations for effortless workflow
Sync with calendars, auto-record meetings, and deliver key insights straight to email, Slack, or CRM.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672cd814e2483e0e0b0a8174_integration-image-new.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672cd85db613c0d538fd4ec9_Ellipse%20239.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/6734d1d32596ac6099695d10_integration%20image%20mobile.png)
Backed by top investors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b3b0816da99196c481f91_logos-ycombinator.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b3b097665b57b12661cc1_logos-SoftBank.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b3b088d4406a70f932f0f_logos-gfc.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b3b0869d9c72858580273_logos-harlem-capital.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67293b586776a82aedd75083/672b3b0848868de341e73dc7_logos-dentsu.svg)
## All the features sales teams need. Without big SaaS prices.
Not just another AI note taker – our platform is crafted exclusively for SaaS sales teams

generated_description:
SilkChart is a San Francisco-based company that launched in 2022, innovating the sales process by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence. As part of Y Combinator’s Batch S22, they’ve quickly carved out a niche in the realm of sales enablement.

The company's mission is clear: to be the go-to AI Sales Assistant that helps sales teams adopt their playbooks effectively and, ultimately, close more deals. SilkChart does this by analyzing sales calls to evaluate how well representatives execute these playbooks. Notably, it identifies coaching opportunities for managers and provides actionable feedback to sales reps, allowing them to enhance their performance.

With a lean team of eight, led by their Group Partner Jared Friedman, SilkChart is positioned within a robust ecosystem of B2B SaaS, sales, and artificial intelligence. Their platform isn’t just another AI tool; it’s specifically designed for SaaS sales teams, handling call analysis and offering insights that help users improve their meeting performances. 

Key features include:
- Proactive call analysis that surfaces coaching opportunities.
- Actionable feedback that suggests how reps might improve their pitches.
- Notification systems for deal health indicators and potential churn risks.
- Seamless integrations with existing tools such as calendars and CRM systems.

SilkChart’s value proposition centers around its ability to enhance playbook adoption and optimize the sales process without the hefty costs often associated with SaaS platforms. For those in sales looking for a structured way to improve their outcomes, SilkChart might just be the AI partner they need.

You can learn more or get started with SilkChart by visiting [their website](https://www.silkchart.com).
